body_html: From my limited understanding, I think the documentation is correct. The first logit in your output is computed from all true samples, not just from 1 true sample. The rest 3 logits are for the 3 random samples.

body: From my limited understanding, I think the documentation is correct. The first logit in your output is computed from all true samples, not just from 1 true sample. The rest 3 logits are for the 3 random samples.
